items.typeLine: Alchemist's Quicksilver Flask of the Order
craftedMods: 25% reduced Mana Cost of Skills during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Mageblood
enchantMods: Enemies Withered by you have -6% to all Resistances
explicitMods: Magic Utility Flasks cannot be Used
Leftmost 3 Magic Utility Flasks constantly apply their Flask Effects to you
Magic Utility Flask Effects cannot be removed
flavourText: Rivers of power course through your veins.

items.name: Asenath's Gentle Touch
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Duration Gems
explicitMods: Curse Enemies with Temporal Chains on Hit
Non-Aura Curses you inflict are not removed from Dying Enemies

Enemies near corpses affected by your Curses are Blinded
Enemies Killed near corpses affected by your Curses explode, dealing
3% of their Life as Physical Damage
flavourText: Cool the head and cool the blade.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 74% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff which can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

70% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take 2403 Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants mana regeneration to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies Regenerate 8.4 Mana per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

implicitMods: 9% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
explicitMods: 10% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills

Melee Skills have 5% less Area of Effect while in Blood Stance
Melee Skills have 15% more Area of Effect while in Sand Stance
Melee Skills deal 5% less Area Damage while in Sand Stance
Spells deal 20% increased Area Damage while in Blood Stance
Spells have 10% increased Area of Effect while in Sand Stance
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a portal to the current area's town.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Chaos, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their chaos resistance.

Cursed enemies take 10% increased Damage from Damage Over Time effects
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Maloney's Nightfall
implicitMods: Gain 15% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
explicitMods: 9 to 15 Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
25% chance to create a Smoke Cloud when Hit
60% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies
flavourText: Fear not the dark, the song of night,
Hear not the arch, the falling cry.
My giving sun, fight no more,
Rest alone, my grand nightfall.

items.name: Replica Dragonfang's Flight
explicitMods: +3 to Level of all Blade Vortex Gems
Items and Gems have 15% reduced Attribute Requirements
flavourText: "Did we make this? Why do we have no record of it?
We were warned that there would be consequences..."
- Administrator Qotra

items.name: Widowhail
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
Grants 1% increased Area of Effect per 4% Quality
explicitMods: 250% increased bonuses gained from Equipped Quiver
flavourText: "I loosed a volley of arrows into the heart of the man
who slew my beloved. There was no satisfaction, no
healing, no revenge. There was only... emptiness."
- Chieftainess Ahuana of the Ramako Tribe

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which lets you deal more physical damage. When you kill an enemy while you have this buff, this skill will summon a Sentinel of Purity, or refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them. The Sentinels of Purity have a single-target melee attack and an area melee attack.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. They cast me aside as if I am some bastard child.
If they only knew the power I possess.
